name: Fruit Bar
description:
Combining the Match-3 gameplay with rotating orientations.

Rotate, Combo & Juice!

If you are using device that has an accelerometer but  cannot rotate the fruits correctly, please check out this alternative link . Apple devices cannot request device motion permission if the web game is hosted in iframe (which is used by itch), and the alternative host should work well.

If you are using iPadOS Safari, please request the mobile version of this page.
